name: Amphilochius, Bishop of Iconium, and Gregory, Bishop of Agrigentum
kontakia: (Tone 2) You are thunder in the sky and a heavenly trumpet,* a hatchet against heresy, a labourer in the vineyard,* a great teacher of the dogma of the Trinity, and a bishop.* O Amphilochius, pray unceasingly with the angels for all of us.
(Tone 4) The Church shines with the splendour of the Holy Spirit* upon those who celebrate your joyful passage into eternal life,* O most blessed father Gregory.
